sentence: Our server was fantastic and when he found out the wife loves roasted garlic and bone marrow, he added extra to our meal and another marrow to go!
explanation: The overall sentiment is highly positive, emphasizing the exceptional service of the server who went above and beyond by adding extra roasted garlic and bone marrow to the meal, and even providing an additional marrow to take home.

sentence: The only good thing was our waiter, he was very helpful and kept the bloddy mary's coming.
explanation: The overall consensus is that the waiter provided a positive experience by being helpful and attentive in serving Bloody Marys, resulting in a positive sentiment rating.

sentence: Best Buffet in town, for the price you cannot beat it.

sentence: I LOVED their mussels cooked in this wine reduction, the duck was tender, and their potato dishes were delicious.

sentence: This is one of the better buffets that I have been to.
